qas.question: With which of his friends did Schwarzenegger start a bricklaying company?
What natural disaster in 1971 contributed to the success of Schwarzenegger's business?

context: In 1968, Schwarzenegger and fellow bodybuilder <a0_0>Franco Columbu<a0_0/> started a bricklaying business. The business flourished thanks to the pair's marketing savvy and an increased demand following the 1971 <a1_0>San Fernando earthquake<a1_0/>. Schwarzenegger and Columbu used profits from their bricklaying venture to start a mail order business, selling bodybuilding and fitness-related equipment and instructional tapes.
